column4: how can you do something like http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ftpcHD3378&feature=player_embedded
everything is customizable, its just how bad you want it.
would want something as simple as installing a theme
don't have that much time to learn how to configure everything
is there a tutorial on how to do this on ubuntu?
is there a tablet running ubuntu?
if you still interested this might help http://gnome-look.org/
for gnome .. that means i have to switch from unity to gnome?
per wiki Unity is a shell interface for the GNOME desktop environment developed by Canonical Ltd for its Ubuntu operating system.
so unity is interface (look) thats running on top of GNOME... so if your interested you may figure out how to replace it
